languages.text: "Хладные торговцы. Каперы. Вольные Торговцы..." {n}Хейнрикс осекается, словно в последний момент останавливает сам себя.{/n} "Сношения с ксеносами к взаимной выгоде не столь редки, Абеляр. Вот что происходило в этом месте — месте, построенном людьми и оборудованном друкари".

traits.locale_text: "Хладные торговцы. Каперы. Вольные Торговцы..." {n}Хейнрикс осекается, словно в последний момент останавливает сам себя.{/n} "Сношения с ксеносами к взаимной выгоде не столь редки, Абеляр. Вот что происходило в этом месте — месте, построенном людьми и оборудованом друкари".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Cold Traders. Privateers. Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."
languages.original_text: "Хладные торговцы. Каперы. Вольные Торговцы..." {n}Хейнрикс осекается, словно в последний момент останавливает сам себя.{/n} "Сношения с ксеносами к взаимной выгоде не столь редки, Абеляр. Вот что происходило в этом месте — месте, построенном людьми и оборудованном друкари".

Rogue Traders…" {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that was what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."

languages.text: “冷市商人、海盗、行商浪人……”{n}海因里希住了口，仿佛最后的猜测让他有些犹豫。{/n}“人类与异形狼狈为奸并不罕见，阿贝拉德。这个地方是人类建造的，用来为黑暗灵族提供便利，这里的情况就是如此。”
languages.original_text: "Cold Traders. Privateers. Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: “冷市商人、海盗、行商浪人……”{n}海因里希住了口，仿佛最后的猜测让他有些犹豫。{/n}“人类与异形狼狈为奸并不罕见，阿贝拉德。这个地方是人类建造的，用来为黑暗灵族提供便利，这里的情况就是如此。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Kalthändler. Freibeuter. Freihändler ..."{n}, Heinrix bricht im letzten Augenblick ab.{/n} "Für beide Seiten profitabler Handel mit Xenos ist nicht sonderlich ungewöhnlich, Abelard. Und genau das hat hier stattgefunden. Von Menschen gebaut, von den Drukhari eingerichtet."
languages.original_text: "Cold Traders. Privateers. Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: "Kalthändler. Freibeuter. Freihändler ..."{n}, Heinrix bricht im letzten Augenblick ab.{/n} "Für beide Seiten profitabler Handel mit Xenos ist nicht sonderlich ungewöhnlich, Abelard. Und genau das hat hier stattgefunden. Von Menschen gebaut, von den Drukhari eingerichtet."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Comerciantes Fríos. Corsarios. Comerciantes Independientes...». {n}Heinrix no termina la frase, como si se detuviera en el último segundo.{/n} «Las relaciones comerciales mutuamente lucrativas con los xenos no son tan infrecuentes, Abelard. Y eso era lo que ocurría en este lugar, un lugar construido por humanos y amueblado por los Drukhari».
languages.original_text: "Cold Traders. Privateers. Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciantes Fríos. Corsarios. Comerciantes Independientes...». {n}Heinrix no termina la frase, como si en el último segundo quisiera ganar tiempo.{/n} «Las relaciones comerciales mutuamente lucrativas con los xenos no son tan infrecuentes, Abelard. Y eso era lo que ocurría en este lugar, un lugar construido por humanos y amueblado por los Drukhari».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Des adeptes du Commerce Froid. Des corsaires. Des libres-marchands... » {n}L'interrogateur s'interrompt un instant, comme s'il hésitait à continuer.{/n} « Les affaires mutuellement profitables avec les xénos ne sont pas rares, Abélard. C'est exactement à cela que servait cet endroit, bâti par les humains et équipé par les Drukharis. »
languages.original_text: "Cold Traders. Privateers. Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: « Des adeptes du Commerce Froid. Des corsaires. Des libres-marchands... » {n}L'interrogateur s'interrompt un instant, comme s'il hésitait à continuer.{/n} « Les affaires mutuellement profitables avec les xénos ne sont pas rares, Abélard. C'est exactement à cela que servait cet endroit, bâti par les humains et équipé par les Drukharis. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「闇商人、私掠船、自由開拓者…」{n}ハインリックスは、最後の瞬間に自分を制御するように言葉を切った。{/n}「異種族との互恵的な交易はそれほど珍しいことではない、家令長さん。そして、それがここで行われていたことだ。人間によって建設され、デュカーリが備品を持ち込んだ」
languages.original_text: "Cold Traders. Privateers. Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: 「闇商人、私掠船、自由開拓者…」{n}ハインリックスは、最後の瞬間に自分を制御するように言葉を切った。{/n}「異種族との互恵的な交易はそれほど珍しいことではない、家令長さん。そして、それがここで行われていたことだ。人間によって建設され、デュカーリが備品を持ち込んだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Soğuk Tacir olur. Korsan olur. Hür Tacir olur..." {n}Heinrix, kendini son anda tutmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Ortak kazanç çerçevesinde zenolarla iş birliği, görülmemiş bir şey değil Abelard. Burada da aynen bu olmuş işte. İnsanlar inşa etmiş, Drukhariler dekore etmiş."
languages.original_text: "Cold Traders. Privateers. Rogue Traders..." {n}Heinrix breaks off, as if stopping himself at the last moment.{/n} "Mutually profitable commerce with xenos is not that uncommon, Abelard. And that is what went on in this place, a place built by humans and furnished by the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: "Soğuk Tacir olur. Korsan olur. Hür Tacir olur..." {n}Heinrix, kendini son anda tutmuşçasına sözünü kesiyor.{/n} "Ortak kazanç çerçevesinde zenolarla iş birliği, görülmemiş bir şey değil Abelard. Burada da aynen bu olmuş işte. İnsanlar inşa etmiş, Drukhariler dekore etmiş."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
